programme.title: Unforgiven (1992)
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff.

programme.title: The November Man (2014)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA agent is targeted by his former protégé while racing to protect a witness. As the bullets start to fly, he must survive long enough to protect his charge, and root out the mole who has put his entire mission in jeopardy.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: Scream VI (2023)
programme.desc: Bored of the quaint town of Woodsboro, the notorious serial killer Ghostface leaves his small-town stomping grounds behind, pursuing more ambitious conquests in New York City. Determined to overthrow his reign of terror once and for all, a cohort of familiar faces returns to seek justice for the bloodshed. The sixth installment in the horror franchise.

programme.title: Erotic Ghost Story (2023)
programme.desc: A film crew visits a ranch known for eerie past events. As they shoot, mysterious occurrences unfold and spirits of past victims emerge, haunting the team.

programme.title: Life (2017)
programme.desc: This science fiction saga tells the story of astronauts on the International Space Station who retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Lauras abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: True Grit (2010)
programme.desc: An alcoholic US Marshal and a 14-year-old girl track down her fathers killer with the help of a Texas Ranger. As the three brave dangerous American Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration.

programme.title: Letters From Iwo Jima (2006)
programme.desc: Best Director nominee Clint Eastwoods charged companion piece to his "Flags of Our Fathers" is a poignant and impressive deconstruction of the World War II battle from the perspective of the Japanese forces. Ken Watanabe gives a commanding performance as Gen. Tadamichi Kuribayashi. The film was a Best Picture nominee and was coproduced by Eastwood and Steven Spielberg. Iris Yamashitas script was up for Best Original Screenplay. Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryo Kase.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker (2008)
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner heads the cast of this Oscar-winning war drama about a trio of soldiers who specialise in dismantling improvised explosive devices in Baghdad. These three members of the Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad must put their fear and their personal beefs aside to keep themselves from going to "the hurt locker", the nickname soldiers have for where you recuperate after being injured in an explosion.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.desc: Oliver Stone reassesses John F. Kennedys assassination 30 years after his first examination of the horrific event that shaped a generation.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: Tale of good versus evil as a detective obsessively tracks an expert thief. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Pacino and De Niro have appeared on-screen together.Generated by Tempest EPG Generatorhttps://github.com/K-vanc/Tempest-EPG-Generator

programme.title: Ezra (2023)
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezras future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays (1995)
programme.desc: A single woman, who is newly unemployed, dreads the annual Thanksgiving visit with her loving, but overbearing family.

programme.title: Parallel (2024)
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Forrest Gump (1994)
programme.desc: The extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century.

programme.title: Last Man Standing (1996)
programme.desc: A lone stranger takes on two factions of rival bootleggers in a desolate 1930s frontier town, pitting both sides against each other and profiting from the chaotic results. Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, Christopher Walken, Michael Imperioli, David Patrick Kelly, Alexandra Powers, Karina Lombard, Leslie Mann, Ned Eisenberg, Ken Jenkins, R.D. Call, Ted Markland, Patrick Kilpatrick, Luis Contreras.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A US Army captain leads a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldiers brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An American military officer leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theatre owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich in a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theatre.

programme.title: Forrest Gump (1994)
programme.desc: The extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A US Army captain leads a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldiers brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)

They team up with a French theatre owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich in a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theatre.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latters henchmen try to head them off and free their leader.

programme.title: Two for the Money (2005)
programme.desc: Drama about an ex-footballer whose knack for handicapping football games lands him a job with a famous sports bookie.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting (1997)
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by co-stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined cleaner who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist

programme.title: Treasure (2024)
programme.desc: An American journalist decides to travel back to Poland with her Holocaust-surviving father. The goal of their trip was to revisit some of his favorite childhood locations. But an internal resistance to his past trauma proved to be more difficult than originally thought.

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: James Bond tries his hand at outwitting a terrorist banker.

programme.title: Old School (2003)
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny (1992)
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South.

programme.title: The Infiltrator (2016)
programme.desc: Federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobars Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. Based on a true story.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: James Bond tries his hand at outwitting a terrorist banker.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: The Infiltrator (2016)
programme.desc: Federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobars Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. Based on a true story.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny (1992)
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South.

programme.title: Seabiscuit (2003)
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuits downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles (1987)
programme.desc: Tale about a snob and a slob on the road who keep running into trouble?and each other?on their respective way home for Thanksgiving after they get stuck in Wichita when they were en route to Chicago.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy (1999)
programme.desc: A woman is framed for the murder of her husband in this riveting thriller. While in prison, she discovers her husbands alive. Knowing that she cant be tried for the same crime twice, she vows to find him upon her release from jail.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset (2024)
programme.desc: Deep in the remote wilderness, an unusual and wholly unique family passes their days in relative harmony. The tribe of Sasquatches, though reclusive, creates a thriving community steeped in its own ways as the members navigate love, loss, and hopes for the future.

programme.title: Bad Behaviour (2023)
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together.

programme.title: Divergent (2014)
programme.desc: In a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent (2015)
programme.desc: Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews.

programme.title: London Has Fallen (2016)
programme.desc: A secret service agent, the President of the United States and an MI-6 Agent must work together to stop a terrorist plot to assassinate world leaders and destroy landmarks in the city of London.

programme.title: The Outfit (2022)
programme.desc: Leonard is an English tailor who used to craft suits on Londons world-famous Savile Row. After a personal tragedy, hes ended up in Chicago, operating a small tailor shop in a rough part of town where he makes beautiful clothes for the only people around who can afford them: a family of vicious gangsters.

programme.title: Buried (2010)
programme.desc: American truck driver Paul Conroy awakens to find himself buried alive after being captured by insurgent guerrillas in Iraq. With only a lighter and a mobile phone at his disposal, Paul works frantically to escape as his oxygen supply dwindles.

programme.title: Youre Next (2013)
programme.desc: Crispian and his new girlfriend Erin attend a family reunion that turns into a feral massacre when a gang of masked killers invade a sprawling country mansion on a ruthless mission of murder.

programme.title: The Price We Pay (2022)
programme.desc: Grace is taken hostage by a gang of thieves raiding a pawnshop. The gang must quickly escape, so they kidnap her and hide in a remote farmhouse where they discover a secret dungeon with signs of sadism and torture all over the walls. Grace must navigate this dangerous maze to survive.

programme.title: 10,000 B.C. (2008)
programme.desc: Fun prehistoric adventure about a tribe of mammoth hunters. When theyre raided by marauders who kidnap survivors to serve as slaves, brave DLeh leads a rescue party across perilous terrain fraught with saber-toothed tigers and killer dodos.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods (2012)
programme.desc: Five friends in a secluded cabin encounter unspeakable horror as they become the subjects of an arcane ritual that dates back to the beginning of time.

programme.desc: A masked serial killer known as "the Other" turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.

programme.title: Mean Girl Murders
programme.desc: Becoming an influencer is a full-time job that can inspire jealousy and rivalry in the competition for followers. When a tragic accident pulls back the curtain on one very online life, what really happens on the other side of the screen emerges. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mean Girl Murders

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire entrepreneur in Tempe, Ariz., is investigated. (Repeat).

Mientras, deberá hacer frente a un difícil divorcio.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Arthur Curry, también conocido como Aquaman (Jason Momoa), es un habitante de un poderoso reino subacuático que recibe el nombre de la Atlántida. En esta película repleta de acción, aventura, e incluso partes de terror, conoceremos sus orígenes, desde que era un niño criado por un hombre humano y considerado un paria por los suyos, hasta que crece y debe hacer frente a los problemas que han aparecido en su mundo. Entonces, este hombre mitad humano y mitad atlante, emprenderá el viaje de su vida.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell es una inescrupulosa mujer de negocios que pierde todo luego de ser enviada a prisión por tráfico de influencias. Al quedar libre, se dispone a convertirse en la empresaria favorita del país, pero no todos están dispuestos a perdonarla. Ella se verá obligada a trabajar con una empleada, a la que solía maltratar bastante seguido, y con su hija, una Girl Scout que le aporta la brillante idea de dedicarse el imperio del brownie, un negocio multimillonario.

programme.title: Good Time
programme.desc: Constantine es un criminal que, junto con su hermano menor Nick, intenta asaltar un banco en Nueva York. Pero cuando el robo sale mal, Nick, quien tiene una discapacidad mental, acaba en la cárcel y Constantine hará lo imposible por liberarlo.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Un magnate inaugura un parque temático habitado por dinosaurios creados gracias a la ciencia. Tras haber clonado diferentes especies y manipularlas genéticamente, su empresa de bioingeniería logró recuperar a estas criaturas extinguidas. En la apertura este magnífico lugar ubicado en una isla de Costa Rica, desborda de gente y todos están felices y asombrados. Hasta que la naturaleza les tiene preparada una sorpresa.

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: M. Night Shyamalan (director de "El Sexto Sentido") escribió esta historia protagonizada por Mel Gibson como un ex-pastor desilusionado, que descubre misteriosos círculos en sus tierras. Al poco tiempo, descubre que esto está pasando en todo el mundo, lo que podría señalar el fin de la humanidad.

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff Chang es un talentoso estudiante de medicina que siempre ha hecho lo correcto; pero de repente, se da cuenta de lo que ha sido su vida y pone en peligro su educación cuando decide celebrar su cumpleaños número 21 con dos amigos una noche antes de un examen muy importante para la facultad de medicina. Lo que se suponía que iba a ser solo una cerveza rápida se convierte en una noche de humillación que termina en desastre.

programme.title: Get Millie Black
programme.desc: Una detective regresa a Jamaica para resolver un caso complicado. Enfrenta desafíos personales y descubre secretos oscuros mientras busca la verdad oculta.

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: Peter Lake se gana la vida en el duro Nueva York del siglo XIX, a veces de manera no muy honrada. Un día, planea un atraco a una rica mansión supuestamente vacía... Pero cuando Peter entra en ella, descubre que una hermosa joven vive allí. Una hermosa joven, Beverly Penn, gravemente enferma, de la que pronto se enamora y por la que construirá un mundo de fantasía.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell es una inescrupulosa mujer de negocios que pierde todo luego de ser enviada a prisión por tráfico de influencias. Al quedar libre, se dispone a convertirse en la empresaria favorita del país, pero no todos están dispuestos a perdonarla. Ella se verá obligada a trabajar con una empleada, a la que solía maltratar bastante seguido, y con su hija, una Girl Scout que le aporta la brillante idea de dedicarse el imperio del brownie, un negocio multimillonario.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Un cuento sobre el crecimiento y el paso de la adolescencia a la madurez, situado en el 2002 en Sacramento, una adolescente excéntrica que asiste a una escuela secundaria católica lidia con el dolor del primer amor y los enfrentamientos con su madre sobre sus planes para el futuro.

programme.title: The Making of the Penguin
programme.desc: Un pingüino lucha por sobrevivir en la Antártida. Explora su vida diaria mientras enfrenta desafíos extremos y descubre la belleza de su entorno helado.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Las joyas de la comedia Tina Fey y Amy Poehler se unen en esta demoledora y traviesa aventura. Fay interpreta a una mujer exitosa que no puede tener hijos y arregla que una joven insensata de clase trabajadora sea la madre biológica de su hijo. Steve Martin, Sigourney Weaver. Escrita y dirigida por Michael McCullers.

programme.title: Get Millie Black
programme.desc: Una detective regresa a Jamaica para resolver un caso complicado. Enfrenta desafíos personales y descubre secretos oscuros mientras busca la verdad oculta.

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate
programme.desc: Tita y Pedro se aman en secreto mientras ella cuida a su hermana embarazada. Pedro se une a la Revolución y regresa herido. Tita enfrenta desafíos inesperados.

programme.title: Caro Comes Out
programme.desc: Caro Hernández, una escritora cubanoamericana, quiere anunciarle a su familia, cuyos miembros residen en Miami, que es lesbiana.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: En un universo lleno de intrigas, alianzas se forjan y secretos se revelan. La Casa Imperial enfrenta desafíos mientras la desconfianza amenaza con desestabilizar todo.

programme.title: Proyecto Florida
programme.desc: Una niña de apenas seis años y sus amigos pasan un verano maravilloso, disfrutando de los días estivales viviendo muchas aventuras alrededor de un pequeño motel. Su inocencia, por el bien de ellos, les impide darse cuenta que sus padres y el resto de adultos que los rodean atraviesan momentos muy difíciles.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Art imitates life as the East Highland crew watches their complicated dynamics reflected in Lexi's long-awaited play. Meanwhile, Fezco gets ready to attend. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: All My Life, My Heart Has Yearned for a Thing I Cannot Name
programme.desc: As the show goes on, fragments of memories collide with the present and future. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Rue celebrates Christmas in the aftermath of being left by Jules at the train station and relapsing in the first of two special episodes. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: F*ck Anyone Who's Not a Sea Blob
programme.desc: Jules reflects on the year over the Christmas holiday. (Repeat).

programme.title: Venus and Serena
programme.desc: Sisters and pro tennis players Venus and Serena Williams are profiled over the course of 2011, as Venus struggles with an autoimmune disease while Serena suffers a pulmonary embolism. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a memoir by Jeannette Walls, a young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents. Now married to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values. (Repeat).

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: Teenager Jody and her dad accompany each other at a music concert featuring pop star Lady Raven. Excited to share a night of music and fun, Jody and her dad soon become entangled in a deadly game. While she enjoys the music, her dad discovers a frantic FBI search for a deranged killer called The Butcher. As the hunt intensifies, a sinister truth is revealed. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
programme.desc: A hardened survivor is hired for an impossible task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In 2003, an Indonesian scientist makes a devastating discovery. In 2023, now outside of the quarantine zone, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate as they navigate a long-abandoned Boston overrun with Infected. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After a global pandemic, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: On the streets of a newly free Kansas City, Henry fights to protect his brother Sam from rebel soldiers who will stop at nothing to appease their ruthless leader. As her manhunt continues, Kathleen doubles down on her quest for revenge, while Ellie forms a meaningful friendship. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After months of traveling, Joel and Ellie receive a grave warning about what lies ahead. Later, Ellie learns more about Joel's past – while Joel tries his best to forget. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives – and the fate of the world – forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors, and draws the attention of its leader. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After being pursued by Infected, a pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Years later, Ellie is forced to grapple with the emotional toll of her journey, while Joel faces a devastating decision of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: This stunning thriller follows discredited journalist Mikael Blomkvist (Daniel Craig) and mysterious computer hacker Lisbeth Salander as they work together to solve the mystery of a 40-year-old murder and uncover the dark secrets of a wealthy family. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: A rock star and her boyfriend find their vacation interrupted by an old flame of hers, a music producer who clearly wants to win her back. Meanwhile, the latter's daughter also appears eager to break up the couple in this dazzling, erotic drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Time
programme.desc: Constantine Nikas lands himself in hot water when his younger brother gets thrown in prison after their bank-robbery attempt goes south. This nonstop thrill ride follows Constantine as he tries to free his sibling from jail by going deeper into the chaotic and violent underbelly of New York City. (Repeat).

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: In this charming comedy-drama, a father raises his six children in a forest in the Pacific Northwest. But when a family tragedy prompts them to take a road trip to New Mexico, the kids are forced to interact with the outside world for the first time. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: Ripping and rousing epic about the mythic Scandinavian hero (Ray Winstone) and his band of warriors who set out to save a kingdom by vanquishing fire-breathing dragons and a bewitching creature of the deep (played with watery menace by Angelina Jolie). Crispin Glover is a freaky fright as the demonic, misshapen Grendel. Directed by Robert Zemeckis. Written by Neil Gaiman and Roger Avary. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Fact-based sports biopic stars Rob Brown as Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The biographical drama chronicles the rise of the four Von Erich brothers in the field of professional wrestling in the 1980s. Coached by their father Fritz Von Erich, Kevin, Kerry, David, and Mike become famous wrestling champions as they dominate the ring with countless victories. Soon, their fame turns into a curse when deadly tragedy strikes the Von Erich family. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
programme.desc: When a famous cowboy is murdered in cold blood, his crotchety sidekick Lefty is determined to lead his own posse and bring the killer to justice. Along the way, Lefty must learn what it takes to be a hero in this clever Western. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A San Francisco police detective becomes frustrated when the laws of the day keep him from apprehending a crazed sniper who is terrorizing the city. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with a rare form of dementia that has a rapid decline, John Knox tries desperately to continue his work as a hitman, with memory loss getting in the way. When John's son Miles shows up at his door begging for help because he's killed the man who impregnated his daughter, John goes into overdrive with his friend Xavier to cover up the crime. Unfortunately, his good intentions for Miles backfires, and soon, his son is involved in John's criminal world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: In this charming coming-of-age tale set in 2002 Sacramento, an eccentric teenager attending a Catholic high school deals with the pangs of first love and clashes with her mother over her plans for the future. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride set in a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland. (Repeat).

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: Grappling with the onset of middle age, a Chinese immigrant discovers that she can traverse across time and space. Teaming up with her alternate lives, the unlikely allies realize that they alone possess the power to protect the world from calamity, plunging them into the midst of an outlandish quest. (Repeat).

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep
programme.desc: Maja is peacefully living with her husband Lewis in post-World War II America when one day she meets their next-door neighbor. Immediately, it dawns on her that he was the person who brutalized her and her family during the war. Convinced that she is right, she devises a plan to kidnap him and to make him pay for the heinous crimes he committed against her that brought immense suffering into her life. (Repeat).

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: The third installment of the horror franchise follows adult film star Maxine Minx after escaping a Texas massacre. She claws her way to 1980s Hollywood pursuing a dream role. But a killer stalks LA's starlets. As blood spills, Maxine's dark past threatens to shatter her shot at fame. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: In this thrilling and intelligent Best Picture nominee, Bruce Willis gives a finely nuanced performance as a child psychologist; the superb Haley Joel Osment costars as his tormented patient, who has visions of the dead. (Repeat).

programme.title: Venus and Serena
programme.desc: Sisters and pro tennis players Venus and Serena Williams are profiled over the course of 2011, as Venus struggles with an autoimmune disease while Serena suffers a pulmonary embolism. (Repeat).

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: During the transition to talkies, a 1920s silent-film star, who long ago paid his dues as a stunt man and bit player, falls in love with a spunky chorus girl, much to the dismay of his screechy-voiced prima-donna leading lady, in this lighthearted musical spoof of the early days of Hollywood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: A willful Irish farmer's romantic attraction to her neighbour is initially thwarted by his obliviousness to her affections. Their relationship begins to blossom through the latter's indignation over his father's plans to sell the family farm to his American nephew. (Repeat).

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: After bumping into Elvis Presley at a party, teenager Priscilla Beaulieu becomes enamored with the musical icon. Their courtship and consequent marriage change Priscilla's life. What follows is a tantalizing, turbulent journey of love and fame. Based on the true story of the Presley family, the drama film chronicles Priscilla's relationship with Elvis Presley. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dream Scenario
programme.desc: The narrative follows a very unkempt professor named Paul Matthews. His life is quite uneventful until suddenly, his image appears in people's dreams. Soon, millions of strangers find themselves dreaming about him. The event made him an overnight sensation. However, things change when these dreams soon become nightmares for some and, later, for many. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Most Wanted Man
programme.desc: The late Philip Seymour Hoffman gives one of his finest performances in this tense, haunting adaptation of John le Carré's 2008 novel. Hoffman stars as a rogue agent who attempts to combat potential jihadist violence and protect a Chechen immigrant in post-9/11 years. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: A black man who lives with his best friend and works in an elderly care facility dreams of living in the grand Victorian house his grandfather built in the Fillmore District. Now a white, affluent area, he is totally priced out of the neighborhood, but it doesn't stop him from dreaming in this drama about place, identity and race. (Repeat).

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, the United States finds itself plunged into a dystopian nightmare as violent conflict erupts across the nation. A team of scrappy journalists entrenched in the military bands together to venture to the nation's capital before a troupe of rebels destroys the last bastion of normalcy in the country. (Repeat).

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Electrifying chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship. (Repeat).

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: In this charming comedy-drama, a father raises his six children in a forest in the Pacific Northwest. But when a family tragedy prompts them to take a road trip to New Mexico, the kids are forced to interact with the outside world for the first time. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins stars in this fast-paced saga as a billionaire whose flight to Alaska crashes in the wilderness. With another survivor (Alec Baldwin), and armed with only a pocket knife, he struggles with his own insecurities while trying to stay alive. Elle Macpherson, Harold Perrineau, L.Q. Jones, Kathleen Wilhoite, David Lindstedt, Mark Kiely, Gordon Tootoosis. (Repeat).

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: An inexperienced and idealistic teacher invests himself in a group of problem kids at a high school in a slum of London's East End. (Repeat).

programme.title: After the Bite
programme.desc: Following a series of great white shark attacks that dominated the headlines, one Cape Cod community renegotiates its relationship with the marine environment. Local residents, fishermen, and environmentalists are forced to confront dramatic changes to their way of life. How far can we push nature before it bites back? (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
programme.desc: When a famous cowboy is murdered in cold blood, his crotchety sidekick Lefty is determined to lead his own posse and bring the killer to justice. Along the way, Lefty must learn what it takes to be a hero in this clever Western. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Southside With You
programme.desc: Touching docudrama about Barack Obama's first date with Michelle Robinson, his future wife, during the summer of 1989 in Chicago. (Repeat).

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day. (Repeat).

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: After accusing fellow historian David Irving of being a Holocaust denier, Deborah Lipstadt is sued for libel and forced to provide proof of her claims in court. This gripping drama is based on a real-life legal case, which reached a verdict in 2000. (Repeat).

actor.role: Professor Robert Jan van der Pelt

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Classical Baby
programme.desc: Part of a two-part episode featuring lullabies from around world. Performers include Bola de Nieve; Miriam Makeba; Paul McCartney; and Corinne Bailey Rae. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach pre-schoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: What a fantastic magical delight this is. Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chipmunk brothers Alvin, Simon and Theodore, with lovely (though high-pitched) singing voices, become pop sensations in this rollicking comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise this Christmas as a mysterious reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ondine
programme.desc: In this breathtaking drama directed by Neil Jordan, romance blossoms between a fisherman (Colin Farrell) and a mysterious woman (Alicja Bachleda) he rescues from drowning, but a violent figure from her past threatens to destroy their relationship. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A misfit Viking teen befriends a dragon, despite his tribe's tradition of dragon slaying, in this thrilling adaptation of the children's fantasy book by Cressida Cowell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marcel: The Shell with Shoes On
programme.desc: The animated film follows the life of a young mollusk named Marcel as he discovers the world anew. When a documentary filmmaker shares an online snippet of Marcel, the shy shell goes viral. Soon, Marcel goes on a life-changing adventure to find his lost family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: This beautifully made adaptation of Maurice Sendak's beloved children's story follows a misunderstood boy on his strange journey through the world of the Wild Things, a race of strange creatures who make Max their king. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: What a fantastic magical delight this is. Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: This fantasy musical film follows the story of Willy Wonka, the famous but eccentric chocolatier based on the character from Roald Dahl's novel. In particular, it emphasizes his rise to the top. The narrative traces his beginnings as a young adult who started as an employee selling chocolate in a store until he became driven to enter the chocolate industry eventually. This film acts as a prequel to the 1971 film adaptation of Dahl's novel. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill is back as paleontologist Alan Grant for another wild walk in the park. William H. Macy and Tea Leoni costar as a couple whose son is lost on a remote dino-infested island. Posing as wealthy adventurers, they lure Grant to the island to help in their search, and all three get much more than they bargained for. The special effects are outstanding. Alessandro Nivola, Trevor Morgan, Michael Jeter. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: In this stunning action epic, a tormented Hercules must summon his inner hero to save the kingdom of Thrace from an evil warlord. With the help of his loyal band of mercenaries, he wages a valiant fight to restore peace to the troubled land. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Feline spy Kitty Galore plots to conquer the world and gain the upper paw over her rivals in this hilarious comedy-adventure. In order to fight this unforeseen threat, cats and dogs must band together to face a common enemy. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Woodstock and friends embark on an epic adventure in this charming adaptation of the beloved comic strip. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Retired spy Marissa (Jessica Alba) is reactivated by her agency in order to stop the Timekeeper from taking the entire planet hostage, and she gets some unexpected help from her stepdaughter Rebecca and stepson Cecil in this family-friendly thrill ride. (Repeat).

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The first big-screen adventure of the popular children's (and adults') cartoon series follows SpongeBob as he sets out to retrieve King Neptune's stolen crown, save Mr. Krabs, who has been accused of the theft, and stymie Plankton and his plot for world domination. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Peter Jackson directed the magnificent adaptation of the first book in J.R.R. Tolkien's trilogy. Elijah Wood stars as Frodo Baggins, a hobbit who inherits a magical ring and spurs a titanic struggle between good and evil in Middle-earth. Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Sean Astin, Liv Tyler, Christopher Lee, Ian Holm. (Repeat).

programme.title: The LEGO Batman Movie
programme.desc: In this brilliant and hilarious spin-off of "The Lego Movie," Batman defends Gotham City from criminals and supervillains while bonding with a young orphan he accidentally adopted—who, of course, eventually becomes his sidekick Robin. (Repeat).

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: This animated tale focuses on Krypto the Super-Dog, otherwise known as Superman's pet. Since he has his own superpowers, Krypto enjoys saving the world with the Man of Steel. However, he finds himself challenged when Superman is kidnapped one day, and the other human superheroes can't help. With the help of superpower-infused animals in a shelter, it's up to Krypto to save the world and save his superhuman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, which forces Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger to embark on a journey to save the planet in this winning animated sequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dark hilarity ensues after the Addams family—and their macabre traditions—relocate to suburbia, 21st century New Jersey. As they prepare for a major celebration that involves their extended family, they have to maneuver around the machinations of a devious reality-television host. (Repeat).

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: Superman's attempts to rid the world of nuclear weapons are threatened by his old nemesis Lex Luther and the evil one's latest henchman, Nuclear Man. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: In the year 10,191, an emperor rules the universe consisting of two rival factions, and power relies on control of a magic spice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: President Nelson Mandela inspires the South African rugby team to strive for the World Cup in hopes of soothing the country's racial tensions in director Clint Eastwood's inspirational sports drama. As rugby captain Francois Pienaar leads his team on a winning streak, the people of South Africa are brought together by their collective desire for a major sports victory. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documentary bringing together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. In celebration of American Independence Day, this documentary brings together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chipmunk brothers Alvin, Simon and Theodore, with lovely (though high-pitched) singing voices, become pop sensations in this rollicking comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle-of-the-bands competition and face off against a group of female singing chipmunks known as the Chippettes in this wacky and hilarious sequel to the family-friendly hit. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When their annual vacation getaway falls through, a happily unmarried couple are forced to spend Christmas with the families of their four divorced parents on the same day. Reese Witherspoon and Vince Vaughn star in this warm and hilarious holiday tale. Robert Duvall, Jon Favreau, Mary Steenburgen, Dwight Yoakam. Directed by Seth Gordon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Director Robert Rodriguez ("From Dusk till Dawn") crafted this family film about a married pair of former secret agents (Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino) whose espionage genes come in handy when their kids have to rescue them from a madman who wants to rule the world. Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega, Daryl Sabara, Tony Shalhoub, Teri Hatcher, Cheech Marin. (Repeat).

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: After accusing fellow historian David Irving of being a Holocaust denier, Deborah Lipstadt is sued for libel and forced to provide proof of her claims in court. This gripping drama is based on a real-life legal case, which reached a verdict in 2000. (Repeat).

actor.role: Professor Robert Jan van der Pelt

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: This stunning fantasy adventure follows the Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace as they face their greatest temptations in the land of Narnia, where they travel on a magnificent ship known as the Dawn Treader. (Repeat).

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The immense King Kong finds an unlikely ally in the fierce Godzilla as a new, gargantuan threat emerges from deep within the Hollow Earth to threaten all living species, including both Kong and Godzilla. The ape and the lizard must battle the new titan while their human counterparts unlock a series of new secrets hidden on Skull Island. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Hair
programme.desc: Comedian Chris Rock channels his razor-sharp wit in a new direction in this illuminating documentary about the role of hair in the African-American community and its far-reaching effect on cultural identity. Also: a look at the highly competitive world of black stylists. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first film in the series introduced maladroit French police inspector Jacques Clouseau, who attempts to foil high-society thieves who have targeted a prize jewel called the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini's score was Oscar nominated. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
programme.desc: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau drives his former superior so crazy that the ex-boss becomes a deranged criminal who threatens to use a death ray on random people unless his former underling is offered as a sacrifice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Being Mary Tyler Moore
programme.desc: With unprecedented access to the Mary Tyler Moore Estate, friends, family, and colleagues, Being Mary Tyler Moore constructs an intimate mosaic of Mary's sixty-year career in show business. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documentary bringing together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. In celebration of American Independence Day, this documentary brings together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle-of-the-bands competition and face off against a group of female singing chipmunks known as the Chippettes in this wacky and hilarious sequel to the family-friendly hit. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
programme.desc: The creatures commandeer a skyscraper in a satiric sequel. Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, John Glover. Grandpa Fred: Robert Prosky. Forster: Robert Picardo. Dr. Catheter: Christopher Lee. Marla: Haviland Morris. Murray: Dick Miller. Sheila: Jackie Joseph. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: An all-star cast and family-friendly spyjinks power the third chapter of the delightful "Spy Kids" film series. This time, a villainous computer programmer kidnaps Carmen and traps her inside a video game. Her younger brother Juni springs into action and enters the game to rescue her. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ondine
programme.desc: In this breathtaking drama directed by Neil Jordan, romance blossoms between a fisherman (Colin Farrell) and a mysterious woman (Alicja Bachleda) he rescues from drowning, but a violent figure from her past threatens to destroy their relationship. (Repeat).

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as smooth Detroit street cop Axel Foley, who's back on the West Coast to track down a gunman and investigate a series of violent robberies. John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Judge Reinhold reprise their roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezra's future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuit's downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A successful career criminal considers getting out of the business after one last score with his crew, while an obsessive cop desperately tries to put him behind bars. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Al Pacino and Robert De Niro have appeared on-screen together. (Repeat).

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings. (Repeat).

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America
programme.desc: Sergio Leone's epic chronicles the rise and fall of Jewish mobsters in Brooklyn over 50 years. Robert De Niro, James Woods. Deborah: Elizabeth McGovern. O'Donnell: Treat Williams. Carol: Tuesday Weld. Joe: Burt Young. Frankie: Joe Pesci. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone wrote, directed and stars in this knockout sixth go-round in the ring cycle, in which the never-say-die Philadelphia palooka comes out of retirement to fight reigning champ Mason "The Line" Dixon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In this inventive sci-fi film set in a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: In this thrilling and nail-biting entry in the Divergent series, Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind. (Repeat).

programme.title: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A single woman, who is newly unemployed, dreads the annual Thanksgiving visit with her loving, but overbearing family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: The warehouse discovery rattles the team. Joe is torn between two urgent missions. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Dexter dodges bullets both figurative and real as he is forced to decide the fates of those he cares about most; Lila attempts to blackmail Dexter and makes a startling discovery that changes the nature of their relationship. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Special Agent Lundy (Keith Carradine) and the task force believe they've solved the case of the Bay Harbor Butcher, but Dexter might not yet be out of the woods as Lila discovers his "enormous secret" and tries to use it against him. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: An ambitious young stockbroker begins a new firm and finds meteoric success by selling penny stocks to the super wealthy. He amasses a fortune through less than legal means, and soon his law-breaking and massive drug habit collapse his empire. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: An English professor borrows money from a vicious gangster in an attempt to pay off his gambling debts in this poignant psychological drama. At the same time, he must contend with his disappointed mother and his affair with a precocious student. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as smooth Detroit street cop Axel Foley, who's back on the West Coast to track down a gunman and investigate a series of violent robberies. John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Judge Reinhold reprise their roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isn't as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lee's play of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey and Al Pacino bring their "A" games in this winning profile of a pair of high-profile, high-stakes sports handicappers. The former is an ex-college quarterback with a knack for covering the lines and the latter plays his wily mentor. The film, based on a true story, is directed by D.J. Caruso, and features an outstanding costarring turn by Rene Russo as Pacino's troubled wife. Russo also serves as one of the executive producers. Armand Assante, Jeremy Piven, Jaime King. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: This thrilling war epic is about an American military officer who leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theater owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich for a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theater. Directed by Quentin Tarantino. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: Events come to a head at the Carrillo estate faster than expected. Josie makes her move. (Repeat).

programme.title: Killing Eve
programme.sub-title: I Have a Thing About Bathrooms
programme.desc: Having survived a terrifying close call with Villanelle, Eve now has the mole ensconced in a safe house and is buzzing. They have an exciting opportunity to glean information and crack this thing open. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: This thrilling war epic is about an American military officer who leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theater owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich for a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theater. Directed by Quentin Tarantino. programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding action thriller, Driver (Dwayne Johnson) seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brother's death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Driver's life before he completes his task. (Repeat).

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a battered wife goes on the lam with her young daughter, but decides to fight back when her abusive husband tracks them down. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of young bank employees to steal 80 million dollars in one of the largest bank heist in US history. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pig
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun on the run when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath in this smart and inventive sci-fi actioner. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Jack Black earned a Golden Globe nomination for his inspired performance in Richard Linklater's whimsical comedy. He plays a manic slacker-turned-substitute teacher who transforms his sheltered private-school pupils into a full-fledged rock band. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Thee Lavell Crawford
programme.desc: Live from New Orleans, Lavell Crawford is back with a new comedy special, riffing on everything from white neighborhoods to getting blessed with impossibly good deals on chicken and so much more. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of young bank employees to steal 80 million dollars in one of the largest bank heist in US history. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mary Lou Williams: The Lady Who Swings the Band
programme.desc: Jazz pianist Mary Lou Williams was a genius ahead of her time. From child prodigy to "Boogie-Woogie Queen" to groundbreaking composer to mentoring some of the greatest musicians of all time, she never ceased to astound those who heard her play. But for a Black woman in the early 1900s, life as a star did not come easy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Earth Mama
programme.desc: At twenty-four, a pregnant single mother named Gia struggles to keep her family together as she fights the system to reclaim her two kids, Trey and Shaynah, who are stuck in foster care. Resorting to asking her Bay Area community of friends and social workers for help, Gia tries to navigate several obstacles to secure a better life for her unborn child. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.desc: Spotlights present a short film about a girl named Birdie growing up in New Jersey. It perfectly shows her struggles and joys growing up as a Jewish biracial girl. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: Beyonce Knowles and Cuba Gooding Jr. star in this lively musical comedy about an ad executive who must lead a Georgia choir to victory in a gospel competition if he is to collect his inheritance. Along the way, he finds himself getting in tune romantically with one of the singers. (Repeat).

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman and Djimon Hounsou star in Steven Spielberg's sweeping, vividly portrayed historical drama. Set in 1839, the tale follows African slaves who rebel against their captors before their ship reaches U.S. shores. The film also chronicles their recapture in America and the trial that followed. Matthew McConaughey, Nigel Hawthorne, David Paymer, Pete Postlethwaite, Stellan Skarsgard, Anna Paquin. (Repeat).
