Allen must navigate the multiverse to find Batman and convince him to save the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (Repeat).

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: A Massachusetts wife and mother (Hilary Swank) dedicates her life to becoming a lawyer in hopes of exonerating her imprisoned brother (Sam Rockwell), whom she believes was wrongfully convicted of a murder in this electrifying drama directed by Tony Goldwyn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: In this provocative war drama, a British colonel requests a drone strike on a group of terrorists in Nairobi. However, the situation grows more complicated when an American drone pilot discovers that a 9-year-old girl has entered the targeted area, forcing a number of military leaders and politicians to debate the best course of action. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: In rural western Ireland, Mina, a twentysomething artist, finds herself lost amidst an expansive wilderness. Upon finding shelter for the night with three strangers, the unlikely foursome soon finds themselves the target of a sinister, enigmatic creature haunting the night. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pathology
programme.desc: Pathologists play a twisted game in which they challenge each other to commit the perfect, unsolvable murder. Milo Ventimiglia ("Heroes") and Alyssa Milano ("Charmed") star in this intense shocker from the creators of "Crank." Michael Weston, Lauren Lee Smith, Johnny Whitworth. Directed by Marc Scholermann. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: Scott Speedman and Liv Tyler star in this nail-biting suspense thriller about a young couple who are terrorized by three masked intruders at a secluded country house. Written and directed by Bryan Bertino. (Repeat).

programme.title: Evil Dead Rise
programme.desc: This installment of the Evil Dead franchise centers on a complicated family and the demons that haunt them. Estranged sisters Beth and Ellie reunite after many years. Beth drops by Ellie's apartment in Los Angeles where she raises her three kids as a single mother. The sisters discover an ominous book that unleashes a flesh-possessing demon. When the demon takes control of Beth, Ellie and her kids face the worst nightmare of their lives. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends' carefully curated exteriors. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Determined to avenge his family, Paul Atreides joins the Fremen to build a strong war force in preparation for his battle against the Harkonnens. He must navigate the dangerous planet and harness the power of the spice. Fulfilling his destiny as the Kwisatz Haderach, his powers grow, and he becomes more confident in leading the world to the freedom they deserve. The sequel to the 2021 film chronicles the rise of Paul Atreides as a leader and hero. (Repeat).

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: The historical war drama follows multiple families seeking survival in 1860s America. In the backdrop of the Civil War (1861-1865), the allure of the Old West beckons families shattered by war. The Old West is a harsh paradise built on blood, sweat, and the tears of unlikely allies. Through intertwined tales of families, friends, and foes, the struggle for identity and belonging unfolds. (Repeat).

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: In this breathtaking epic, English adventurer John Smith finds love with Pocahontas after arriving in America and being pardoned from a death sentence. Meanwhile, European settlers establish a shaky truce with the Native Americans. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: This horror-mystery film follows awkward teen Owen who, in the 1990s, becomes a big fan of a monster-driven horror television show called The Pink Opaque. In school, he encounters another awkward teen, Maddy, who also likes the show. The two form a bond by watching the show. But when the show is canceled, their interaction also dwindles. Reconnecting again in their twenties, they revisit their fandom of the show as their reality also starts shifting mysteriously. (Repeat).

programme.title: Smoking Tigers
programme.desc: This coming-of-age drama follows the story of Hayoung as she navigates her new life during the 2000s in Los Angeles. Of Korean-American descent, she is still affected by the separation of her parents while trying to be a strong big sister to her younger sister. As the sixteen-year-old starts school in a new elite institution, she encounters new challenges in balancing her exposure to wealthy friends at school and enacting her low-income home realities. (Repeat).

programme.title: Low Tide
programme.desc: Alan and his younger brother Peter find a bag of gold coins in the sand dunes of the Jersey Shore and decide to hide their discovery from Alan's friends Red and Smitty. This secret causes suspicion among the friend group and puts the brothers in danger when criminals and law enforcement get involved. (Repeat).

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
programme.desc: Chuck Norris invades Vietnam again to rescue a wife he thought dead and a son he didn't know he had. Quoc: Aki Aleong. Tan Cang: Roland Harrah III. Lin: Miki Kim. Polanski: Yehuda Efroni. Directed by Aaron Norris. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A wimpy account manager (James McAvoy) is recruited by a sexy mystery woman (Angelina Jolie) to join a secret society of assassins and avenge the murder of his estranged father. Morgan Freeman costars in this non-stop action thrill ride. Directed by Timur Bekmambetov. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: Chev Chelios, a highly deadly professional assassin, is injected with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops. On the hunt for revenge, he must maintain his racing pulse by any and all means necessary. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crank High Voltage
programme.desc: A hit man has his heart stolen by a Chinese gangster in this high-octane action thriller. He's been outfitted with an electronic heart that requires a blast of electricity every once in a while in order to keep working properly. (Repeat).

programme.title: Midsommar
programme.desc: Just as their relationship is on the brink of falling apart, couple Dani and Christian are brought closer by a family tragedy. The mourning Dani then joins Christian and his friends, Josh and Mark, on a trip to a rural Swedish village that is celebrating a once-in-a-blue-moon festival. As the tourists partake in the celebrations, they discover that the idyllic community holds many unnerving secrets, and it all unfolds in broad daylight. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Elizabeth Taylor: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: An unprecedented exploration into the life of Elizabeth Taylor, Hollywood's quintessential star. With access to Taylor's personal archives and 40 hours of newly unearthed, audio interviews, audiences are invited to rediscover, not just a mega star of Hollywood's Golden Age, but a complex woman who navigated lifelong fame, personal identity, and public scrutiny on a global stage from early childhood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: In this provocative war drama, a British colonel requests a drone strike on a group of terrorists in Nairobi. However, the situation grows more complicated when an American drone pilot discovers that a 9-year-old girl has entered the targeted area, forcing a number of military leaders and politicians to debate the best course of action. (Repeat).

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple head off for a romantic weekend in the mountains. Isolated at a remote estate, they are surprised by the arrival of two friends, but just when the weekend starts to get back on track, a violent biker gang turns up and begins to torment them. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: This thrilling adventure yarn finds an older and wiser Tarzan returning to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. There, he clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lil Nas X: Long Live Montero
programme.desc: Capturing the creative dynamo and mesmerizing star power of Lil Nas X as he prepares for and embarks on his first-ever headlining U.S. tour. (Repeat).

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: A gifted medical student puts his education in jeopardy when he decides to celebrate his 21st birthday with two rowdy pals the night before a crucial exam in this sidesplitting comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An army of alien spaceships attack Earth and threaten to destroy the human race, but a handful of survivors band together to stop the invasion. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan digs deeper into the dark psychological underpinnings of "Batman Begins" (2005) in this intense sequel. Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords, but their initial success turns to ashes when the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess leaves her island home and journeys to the outside world, which is being consumed by a massive war. With the help of an American pilot, she works to put an end to the conflict in this thrilling origin story. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Diana must thwart the schemes of two new enemies, media mogul Maxwell Lord and her former friend Barbara Ann Minerva as the threat of the Cold War looms over American soil. However, she must also grapple with the unexpected return of her lost love, Steve. (Repeat).

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Minimalist, edge-of-your-seat thriller about a couple accidentally left at sea in shark-infested waters during a scuba-diving excursion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A seafaring birthday celebration takes a turn for the terrifying when the passengers of a luxury yacht forget to lower the automated ladder before jumping into the ocean for a playful swim. (Repeat).

programme.title: Open Water 3: Cage Dive
programme.desc: In this intense horror thriller, three friends head to shark-infested waters off the coast of Australia to film a cage dive for a reality show. Struck by a sudden wave, the trio are cast into the water unprotected and must work together to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: Upon hearing the news that a huge comet will hit Earth within 48 hours and start the dreaded apocalypse, John Garrity, his estranged wife Allison, and their son Nathan decide to make their way to Greenland, where a group of bunkers is located. The journey, however, proves to be more perilous than they anticipated. Amidst the growing panic and lawlessness around them, the family tries their hardest to catch the last flight to the last possible safe haven on the planet. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: A womanizer is haunted by his many old flames while attending his brother's wedding in this rollicking romantic comedy starring Matthew McConaughey. Having conquered almost the entire bridal party, libidinous celebrity photographer Connor Mead ponders bedding the bride's mother until the Ghosts of Girlfriends Past guide him on an eye-opening tour of his romantic past, present and future. Hilarity blends with heartache as they attempt to discern whether Connor will ever be able to mend his ways. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The biographical drama chronicles the rise of the four Von Erich brothers in the field of professional wrestling in the 1980s. Coached by their father Fritz Von Erich, Kevin, Kerry, David, and Mike become famous wrestling champions as they dominate the ring with countless victories. Soon, their fame turns into a curse when deadly tragedy strikes the Von Erich family. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: Terror comes at a frightening clip when a group of teens have a close brush with death at a racetrack, only to find the Grim Reaper striking back at them with a vengeance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A U.S. Navy fighter pilot struggles to survive after being shot down and captured during a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War. After enduring a stay in a Vietnamese internment camp, he and his fellow soldiers stage a dangerous escape. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: This piercing drama follows a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy as their lives intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (Repeat).

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The Mad Max movie prequel follows Furiosa as a young woman after she is snatched from her sanctuary by Dementus' biker horde. When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A documentary team heads for the Brazilian jungle to search for a remote native tribe, but ends up fleeing from a giant snake. (Repeat).

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sick of Myself
programme.desc: Signe is a woman with an active competition going on with her own boyfriend, Thomas. Their toxic relationship is characterized by attempts at passive-aggressive acts that aim to garner the most attention. Trouble begins when Thomas becomes notoriously famous for creating avant-garde artworks from stolen objects. Not to be outdone, Signe takes pills dangerous to her health in an attempt to steal the spotlight. (Repeat).

programme.title: Little Black Book
programme.desc: Brittany Murphy is utterly charming in this winning comedy. She plays an insecure producer who raids her boyfriend's electronic organizer to find out about his romantic past. Unfortunately, she learns much more than she bargained for. Carly Simon contributed to the terrific soundtrack. Holly Hunter, Kathy Bates, Ron Livingston, Julianne Nicholson. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: Sizzling star Lindsay Lohan sparkles in this romantic comedy about a lucky career gal whose good fortunes are inexplicably reversed after she kisses the unluckiest guy in town at a masked ball. Chris Pine, Faizon Love, Missi Pyle. Directed by Donald Petrie. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Inspection
programme.desc: Ellis French is a young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside. But even as he battles deep-seated prejudice and the grueling routines of basic training, he finds unexpected camaraderie, strength, and support in this new community, giving him a hard-earned sense of belonging that will shape his identity and forever change his life. (Repeat).

programme.title: Showing Up
programme.desc: Lizzy, an introverted and introspective sculptor, works tirelessly to prepare a new collection for an upcoming gallery show. As she strives to invest her creative energy into her art, she must continually work to manage the complex dynamics of her eclectic, melodramatic inner circle of family and friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Astronauts on the International Space Station retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life in this sci-fi thriller. The specimen begins to show signs of aggression, threatening the entire mission. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher suffering from severe obesity attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption. (Repeat).

programme.title: All the World is Sleeping
programme.desc: As an engaged couple plans their dream wedding, the groom is excited but doesn't inform his friends he's getting married. Confused by his secrecy, they hatch a plan to find out what he's hiding. Meanwhile, the bride seems withdrawn, and her groom starts worrying if this relationship is meant to be. (Repeat).

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: This drama follows Sylvia, a single mother who works as a social worker and a care worker. She has been sober for 13 years and is quietly raising her teen daughter, Anna, in Brooklyn. She finds herself attending her high school reunion where she encounters his schoolmate, Saul. She is creeped out when he follows her home from the reunion, but later discovers that Saul has early onset dementia. Saul's brother eventually hires her as Saul's caretaker. (Repeat).

programme.title: God's Waiting Room
programme.desc: In the thick heat of central Florida, Rosie, a musician fresh out of high school, can't shake her boredom. Before long, she meets Jules, a hustler from New York. She falls hard for his streetwise charms and his easy confidence. On the other side of town, Brandon returns home after a decade in prison, but his transition to life on the outside is dogged by the scars of his past. The summer drags on, pushing these three characters together down a dangerous path. (Repeat).

programme.title: Nana's Boys
programme.desc: Nana's Boys focuses on the intimate life of a couple who are confronted with the fact that their relationship is not as solid as they thought. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Collective
programme.desc: The action film tells the story of a highly secretive agency of righteous assassins seeking justice for all. The agency targets a human trafficking ring. They soon find out that the ring's operations are managed by billionaires who live above the law. A new agency recruit helps the assassins take down the ring with his unconventional skillset. (Repeat).

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When a murderer is killed in a police shoot-out, he invokes a voodoo spell that allows him to transfer his spirit into a doll. (Repeat).

programme.title: Down to You
programme.desc: A cooking student begins a relationship with an ambitious freshman that starts well, but eventually hits a rough patch due to various forces that press upon any college student. (Repeat).

programme.title: All the Wrong Ingredients
programme.desc: Desperate to win a high-stakes dessert contest, chef Ben unintentionally cooks up an imaginary friend to help him reinvent the meaning of delicious. But what happens when his ambition becomes a monster? (Repeat).

programme.title: F^¢K '€M R!GHT B@¢K
programme.desc: A queer Black aspiring rapper has two outwit his boss to avoid getting fired after accidentally eating an edible. (Repeat).

programme.title: Days of Heaven
programme.desc: Terrence Malick's exquisitely filmed tale of three migrants on a Texas farm in 1916. Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz, Robert Wilke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Close
programme.desc: Two thirteen year-olds have always been incredibly close but they drift apart after the intimacy of their relationship is questioned by schoolmates. An emotionally transformative and unforgettable portrait of the intersection of friendship and love, identity and independence, and heartbreak and healing. (Repeat).

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: In 2020, a supercomputer determines that human beings pose the greatest threat to Earth, and begins an eradication process. Decades later, a teen struggles to survive in a world dominated by machines in this haunting sci-fi thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: In this sweeping tale of Internet success, nerdy, awkward Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the Web site Facebook and becomes a billionaire, but ends up embroiled in legal disputes as the friends who helped him during his rise to the top are now eager to see him fall. (Repeat).

programme.title: Raging Grace
programme.desc: The thriller follows an undocumented immigrant from the Philippines named Joy. She is struggling to make a living to support her daughter in the United Kingdom. One day, Joy finds a well-paying job as a caretaker for a rich old man afflicted by a terminal disease. Soon, Joy finds out that the old man hides many dark secrets that can ruin everything she worked hard for. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A woman acts as a nanny for a life-size doll, which a couple are using as a coping mechanism for the death of their son two decades earlier. However, she soon suspects that there is more to the doll than meets the eye in this disturbing horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
programme.desc: A manipulative high-school teacher is held hostage by three students. (Repeat).

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isn't as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lee's play of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: In this sweeping tale of Internet success, nerdy, awkward Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the Web site Facebook and becomes a billionaire, but ends up embroiled in legal disputes as the friends who helped him during his rise to the top are now eager to see him fall. (Repeat).

programme.title: Adult World
programme.desc: In this bitingly funny look at twentysomething life, a floundering college graduate reluctantly takes a job at a sex shop in Upstate New York as she seeks an apprenticeship that could help launch her career as a poet. Meanwhile, she finds love and inspiration in the last place she ever expected. (Repeat).

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: A promising football player who wins a scholarship to a 1950s prep school must conceal his religion from his teammates and friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Voyage of the Demeter
programme.desc: In the late nineteenth century, the Russian schooner Demeter embarks on an unusual quest, carrying twenty-four unmarked crates from Carpathia to London. Their voyage seems doomed from the start, given their suspicious orders, as a malevolent presence preys upon each member of the crew. When the ship arrives, at last, in Whitby Harbour, the crew is nowhere to be found. The story is based on a chapter from Bram Stoker's Dracula. (Repeat).

programme.title: Echo In the Canyon
programme.desc: This documentary explores the musical legacy of Laurel Canyon: a mountainous neighbourhood in the Hollywood Hills region that became a countercultural hub in the 1960s and early 1970s. It pays tribute to the enduring influence of West Coast music icons such as The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas and the Papas. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: As the Gestapo escalates their crimes against humanity across Eastern Europe, individuals of minorities and Jewish descent increasingly fear for their lives. Skilled forger Cioma Schönhaus, a young Jewish man, begins crafting fake passports for the members of his community to help shepherd them to safety. Yet his counterfeiting abilities do not stop at documents as he carefully crafts a new identity to take down the enemy from the inside. Based on true events. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Civil Dead
programme.desc: A misanthropic, struggling photographer just wants to watch TV and eat candy while his wife is out of town, but when a desperate old pal resurfaces, his plans are thwarted, with spooky consequences. (Repeat).

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: Kyle Chandler stars in this riveting sci-fi adventure set in a small Ohio town during the summer of 1979. A group of kids witness a train being derailed while filming an amateur movie, and soon an otherworldly force begins to stalk their town as people mysteriously disappear. Directed by J.J. Abrams and produced by Steven Spielberg. (Repeat).

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger stars as a mother who travels down the East Coast with her children as they look for a wealthy socialite to take care of them in this winning comedy based on a childhood recollection of actor George Hamilton. Logan Lerman, Chris Noth, Steven Weber, Nick Stahl, Kevin Bacon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: A suicidal sneaker designer heads to Kentucky for his father's funeral and falls for a perky flight attendant along the way. (Repeat).

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: An advertising executive has a midlife meltdown after becoming infatuated with his daughter's friend and discovering his materialistic wife's infidelity. This Best Picture winner is a biting satire of middle-class suburban Americans in the late 1990s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Men, Women & Children
programme.desc: A dissatisfied husband and wife both look for lovers online in this sprawling, timely drama about the Internet's impact on society. Elsewhere, a woman pushes her daughter's acting career via a Web site, and an overprotective mom monitors her child's online interactions. (Repeat).

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: Beth is a novelist whose recent publication, a memoir, seems to have struck the wrong notes with her fans, yielding lukewarm reviews and sales. Meanwhile, her therapist husband, Don, contends with feelings of discontentment. When Beth eavesdrops on Don confessing his true feelings about her memoir, their long-term marriage soon begins to crumble. (Repeat).

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America
programme.desc: Sergio Leone's epic chronicles the rise and fall of Jewish mobsters in Brooklyn over 50 years. Robert De Niro, James Woods. Deborah: Elizabeth McGovern. O'Donnell: Treat Williams. Carol: Tuesday Weld. Joe: Burt Young. Frankie: Joe Pesci. (Repeat).

programme.title: Anything for Fame
programme.desc: Documentary profile of a new breed of ambitious content creators. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Noah, who is seeking to reconnect with his outcast brother after the death of their father. Noah hopes to make amends and share the family's fortune but instead finds himself in a dark underworld that threatens to tear his family apart. As he struggles to maintain his sanity, Noah is led on a terrifying trail to the truth through a series of cryptic clues. (Repeat).

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events. (Repeat).

programme.title: Deadly Cuts
programme.desc: A black comedy set in a working-class Dublin hair salon where the stylists become accidental vigilantes and community heroes as they take on the gang members and gentrifiers threatening their community. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Bigfoot Trap
programme.desc: A journalist's life is changed forever when he's locked inside of a Bigfoot trap by an insane Sasquatch hunter. Tyler Weisenauer, Zach Lazar Hoffman. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A beautiful woman stops aging after a car accident, and remains 29 for several decades in this intriguing fantasy. She refuses to get close to anyone in order to keep her condition a secret, but reconsiders her solitary lifestyle after falling in love with a philanthropist. (Repeat).

programme.title: Club C. Presents a Queer Comedy Extravaganza!
programme.desc: Emmy nominee and Tony winner Alan C. hosts this cabaret-style gathering featuring seven up-and-coming queer comedians that represent not only the diversity of the queer spectrum, but also of comedy styling, from stand-up to characters to musical performances. The 75-minute special features Joe Castle Baker, Julia Shiplett, duo Zach Teague & Drew Lausch, Nori Reed, Pat Regan, and Larry Owens. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Loneliest Boy in the World
programme.desc: After losing his mother, a lonely boy decides to (literally) dig up some new friends, but when they mysteriously come back to life, he's launched into a series of misadventures as he tries to keep their secret safe from neighbors, classmates and social workers alike. (Repeat).

programme.title: Agent Revelation
programme.desc: A mysteriously contolling ancient dust has its way overcoming humans, but somehow it gives Jim Yung superpowers. As a result, he is taken to a training ground where he must learn why aliens have returned to Earth. (Repeat).

programme.title: Disquiet
programme.desc: After Sam wakes up from a near-fatal accident, he finds himself in a mysterious hospital with no exit. The hospital seems to be staffed by supernatural beings who have different plans for Sam. When he meets up with other scared patients, they band together to try and escape the insidious hospital. (Repeat).

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a battered wife goes on the lam with her young daughter, but decides to fight back when her abusive husband tracks them down. (Repeat).

programme.title: Chantilly Bridge
programme.desc: The sequel film centers on the reunion of a group of friends and how they've navigated their hopes and dreams over the past 25 years. Reflecting on their experiences of parenthood, career, and menopause, the women share insightful observations and reconnect in a unique, life-affirming manner. (Repeat).

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South. (Repeat).

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one. (Repeat).

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
programme.desc: A manipulative high-school teacher is held hostage by three students. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prospect
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. They've secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: (Repeat).

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Frank Oz's remake of the 1975 thriller is a pointed black comedy with a sublime A-list cast. Nicole Kidman stars as a former TV exec who suspects something is amiss when all of her new neighbors seem programmed to please their husbands. Matthew Broderick costars as her Milquetoast husband. Bette Midler, Faith Hill, Glenn Close, Christopher Walken, Jon Lovitz. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances and a literate, emotionally rich script mark this Best Picture nominee. It's an Oscar-nominated adaptation of Michael Cunningham's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel about three troubled women who are deeply dissatisfied with their lives: Virginia Woolf (Best Actress Nicole Kidman), a '50s housewife (Julianne Moore) and a modern-day book editor (Meryl Streep). Ed Harris, Miranda Richardson. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A headstrong military man and a scientist go on a frantic search for stolen nuclear warheads before they fall into the wrong hands in this explosive action thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick's final film is an erotic thriller about an affluent married couple who are plunged into a bizarre odyssey of sexual discovery, which leads to a dangerous realm of adulterous gamesmanship between the twosome. (Repeat).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (Repeat).

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: A supermarket clerk sells drugs to cover her rent in this wild, three-pronged comedy about young Los Angelenos involved in sex, drugs and crime over the course of 24 hours. Meanwhile, friends live it up in Vegas and two actors are busted by a cop. (Repeat).

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: (Repeat).

programme.title: Urban Cowboy
programme.desc: Popular country-western take on "Saturday Night Fever" about a good ol' boy looking for love from atop a mechanical bull in a Houston honky-tonk. Based on a magazine article by Aaron Latham, who co-wrote the script. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Sofia Coppola makes an impressive feature-film directing debut with this haunting adaptation of Jeffrey Eugenides' novel. Kirsten Dunst stars as one of five doomed sisters in 1970s suburbia who become the objects of obsession for a group of boys in their neighborhood. James Woods, Kathleen Turner. (Repeat).

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: An enthralling and bittersweet treat about a mysterious woman who opens a sweets shop in a French town in the late 1950s. She causes a bit of a stir, but before long, her magical concoctions have the locals eating out of her hand. (Repeat).

programme.title: Frozen River
programme.desc: A grim but compelling portrait of women in dire straits features striking performances by Melissa Leo and Misty Upham. They play desperate single moms, one white, one Native American, who team up to smuggle illegal aliens into the U.S. from Canada by driving a car across the icy expanse of the St. Lawrence River. Michael O'Keefe is excellent as a sympathetic border-patrol guard and Charlie McDermott is impressive as Leo's teen son. Written and directed by Courtney Hunt. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: A woman is framed for the murder of her husband in this riveting thriller. While in prison, she discovers her husband's alive. Knowing that she can't be tried for the same crime twice, she vows to find him upon her release from jail. (Repeat).

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: Desperate for a financial solution to their troubles, four alienated girlfriends plan a series of bank heists, growing more daring and reckless with each success. Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox, Kimberly Elise, John C. McGinley, Blair Underwood, Anne Marie Horsford, Ella Joyce, Charlie Robinson, Chaz Lamar Shepard. (Repeat).

programme.title: Labor Day
programme.desc: In this tense, poignant drama, a mentally unstable single mother develops a relationship with an escaped convict over the course of a Labor Day weekend as he hides out in her home. Meanwhile, her young son also begins to bond with the escapee. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: A social-climbing psychopath insinuates himself into a wealthy man's life. Chilling. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: Naomi Watts and Viggo Mortensen star in director David Cronenberg's taut and riveting crime thriller about a naïve midwife working at a London hospital who becomes entangled with Russian mobsters. Vincent Cassel, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Sinead Cusack, Jerzy Skolimowski. (Repeat).

programme.title: Factory Girl
programme.desc: Sienna Miller's bravura turn as wildly popular socialite and 1960s counterculture icon Edie Sedgwick (1943-71) puts the juice in this astounding sex-drugs-and-rock-and-roll biopic. Guy Pearce is equally compelling as Sedgwick's mentor, Andy Warhol, and Hayden Christensen stands out as a Bob Dylan-esque folk rocker with whom she falls in love. Directed by George Hickenlooper from a screenplay by Captain Mauzner. Jimmy Fallon, Beth Grant, Mena Suvari, Tara Summers, James Naughton. (Repeat).

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: An enthralling and bittersweet treat about a mysterious woman who opens a sweets shop in a French town in the late 1950s. She causes a bit of a stir, but before long, her magical concoctions have the locals eating out of her hand. (Repeat).

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars in this action-packed caper film from director John Frankenheimer. Upon his release from prison, a car thief (Affleck) is drawn into a complex casino heist by a mysterious woman (Charlize Theron) and a sadistic criminal (Gary Sinise). Ehren Kruger wrote the script. Clarence Williams III, Isaac Hayes, Dennis Farina, James Frain, Donal Logue. (Repeat).

programme.title: Aftersun
programme.desc: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier. Memories real and imagined fill the gaps between miniDV footage as she tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Baby-Sitters Club
programme.desc: Adaptation culled from the popular book series about seven enterprising adolescents who find their moneymaking efforts hampered by boys, neighbors and parents. Schuyler Fisk, Rachael Leigh Cook. Stacey: Bre Blair. Dawn: Larisa Oleynik. Claudia: Tricia Joe. Melanie Mayron directed. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Christmas Classic
programme.desc: This holiday movie follows Elizabeth, a transplanted "city girl" type of career woman who returns to her hometown to buy a ski resort owned by her ex, Randy. She works for her fiancé's father, so Elizabeth wants to clinch the sale at his behest. Randy objects to being bought outright but proposes an alternative. If Elizabeth could win their town's annual Christmas-related competitions, he'd sell his property. The problem is, she needs to beat the long-running champion: her perfectionist sister. (Repeat).

programme.title: Together Together
programme.desc: A neurotic single father hires a woman to be the surrogate for his future baby. Cue a unique bond that will both bring them together and pull them apart as he begins to pry a little too deeply into the personal life of his surrogate in this comedy film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: This comedy film is about Jan Vokes, a Welsh bartender who comes up with the idea of breeding a horse intended for racing. Since she lives in a town that is down on its luck, her neighbors start pitching in and participate in financing for the horse. They see the horse as their chance of redeeming their town and lifting their spirits as it races up the ranks, hopefully to become a champion thoroughbred. Based on a true story. (Repeat).

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife in this winning romantic comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: This drama follows Sylvia, a single mother who works as a social worker and a care worker. She has been sober for 13 years and is quietly raising her teen daughter, Anna, in Brooklyn. She finds herself attending her high school reunion where she encounters his schoolmate, Saul. She is creeped out when he follows her home from the reunion, but later discovers that Saul has early onset dementia. Saul's brother eventually hires her as Saul's caretaker. (Repeat).

programme.title: All the World is Sleeping
programme.desc: As an engaged couple plans their dream wedding, the groom is excited but doesn't inform his friends he's getting married. Confused by his secrecy, they hatch a plan to find out what he's hiding. Meanwhile, the bride seems withdrawn, and her groom starts worrying if this relationship is meant to be. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand (who also directed) portrays a Manhattan psychiatrist who gets involved with her patient's brother and tries to exorcise the demons of their dysfunctional Southern family. An adaptation of the novel by Pat Conroy (who co-adapted with Becky Johnston). (Repeat).

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: A widow falls for a man who looks like her late husband, and tries to continue her previous marriage. Meanwhile, her new beau must unravel the mystery of her tragic past in this heartfelt romantic drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Baby-Sitters Club
programme.desc: Adaptation culled from the popular book series about seven enterprising adolescents who find their moneymaking efforts hampered by boys, neighbors and parents. Schuyler Fisk, Rachael Leigh Cook. Stacey: Bre Blair. Dawn: Larisa Oleynik. Claudia: Tricia Joe. Melanie Mayron directed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Kelly & Cal
programme.desc: In this uplifting drama, a rebellious suburban mother and a teen who uses a wheelchair forge an unlikely friendship. As they grow closer, they realize they still have a shot at living the lives they thought had slipped away. (Repeat).

programme.title: North of Normal
programme.desc: In the 1970s, the experiences of a little girl, who grows up with her young mother in the commune founded by her hippie grandparents. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hateship Loveship
programme.desc: In this offbeat, touching comedy-drama, a troubled teen convinces her new maid that her estranged father is in love with the caretaker. When the seemingly simple-minded woman moves to be with the drug-addicted man, their lives change in unexpected ways. (Repeat).

programme.title: What Happens Later
programme.desc: Willa and Bill are ex-lovers that will see each other for the first time in years when they both find themselves snowed in, in-transit, at an airport overnight. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher suffering from severe obesity attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption. (Repeat).

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned. (Repeat).

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: A former U.S. security adviser's dark past comes back to haunt her. (Repeat).
